settings.content: Find answers to common questions about our products, shipping, returns, and more. Can't find what you're looking for? Our sleep specialists are here to help.

settings.question: What makes SIJO bedding different?
settings.answer: SIJO bedding is made from innovative, temperature-regulating materials like eucalyptus and bamboo fibers. Our products are naturally cooling, moisture-wicking, hypoallergenic, and sustainably produced. Unlike traditional cotton, our materials actively help regulate your body temperature for optimal sleep comfort.

settings.question: How do I choose between eucalyptus, linen, and cotton?
settings.answer:
Eucalyptus: Best for hot sleepers, incredibly soft, cooling and moisture-wicking
Linen: Breathable luxury, gets softer over time, classic look
Cotton: Familiar feel with temperature-regulating technology, easy care
Bamboo: Ultra-soft, naturally antimicrobial, great for sensitive skin

Our sleep specialists can help you choose the perfect material for your needs.

settings.question: Are SIJO products really temperature regulating?
settings.answer: Yes! Our eucalyptus and bamboo fibers have natural moisture-wicking and breathable properties that help regulate your body temperature. The unique fiber structure allows for superior airflow and moisture management compared to traditional bedding materials. Many customers report sleeping cooler and more comfortably.

settings.question: What sizes do you offer?
settings.answer: We offer all standard sizes: Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, and California King. Our bundles include appropriately sized components for each bed size. Check our size guide for detailed measurements and fit recommendations.

settings.question: How do I care for my SIJO bedding?
settings.answer:
Machine wash cold with like colors
Tumble dry low or air dry for best results
Avoid fabric softeners to maintain breathability
Iron on low heat if needed

Our materials are designed to get softer with each wash while maintaining their temperature-regulating properties.

settings.question: Will the products shrink or fade?
settings.answer: Our bedding is pre-shrunk and colorfast. You may experience minimal shrinkage (1-3%) after the first wash, which is normal for natural fibers. Colors are designed to maintain their vibrancy wash after wash. Following our care instructions will help preserve both fit and color.

settings.question: How often should I wash my bedding?
settings.answer: We recommend washing sheets weekly and comforters every 2-3 months, or as needed. Our materials' natural antimicrobial properties help keep your bedding fresher longer between washes. Pillows should be washed every 3-6 months depending on use.

settings.question: Do you offer free shipping?
settings.answer: Yes! We offer free shipping on all orders $75 and above within the United States. Orders under $75 have a flat shipping rate of $9.95. We also offer free returns within our 30-day trial period.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer:
Standard Shipping: 5-7 business days
Express Shipping: 2-3 business days
Overnight Shipping: 1-2 business days

All orders are processed within 1-2 business days. You'll receive tracking information once your order ships.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We offer a 30-day risk-free trial on all products. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return your items for a full refund. Items must be in original condition with minimal use. We provide free return shipping labels for your convenience.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Currently, we ship within the United States and Canada. International shipping may be available for select products. Please contact our customer service team for specific international shipping inquiries.

settings.question: How do bundle discounts work?
settings.answer:
Bundle discounts are applied automatically at checkout when you purchase qualifying products together:

3-Piece Bundle: 10% off
4-Piece Bundle: 12% off
5+ Piece Bundle: 15% off

No codes neededâ€”just add bundle products to your cart and the discount will be applied automatically.

settings.question: Can I customize my bundle?
settings.answer: Yes! While we offer pre-curated bundles, you can create your own by adding individual products to your cart. As long as you meet the minimum quantity requirements, you'll receive the automatic bundle discount.

settings.question: What's included in each bundle?
settings.answer:
Bundle contents vary by size and type, but typically include:
Essential Bundles: Sheet set + comforter + pillow(s)
Luxury Bundles: Sheet set + comforter + pillows + mattress protector
Complete Sets: All essentials plus decorative accessories

Check individual product pages for detailed bundle contents.

settings.question: Do I need an account to place an order?
settings.answer: No, you can checkout as a guest. However, creating an account allows you to track orders, save favorite products, access exclusive offers, and manage your information easily for future purchases.

settings.question: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with tracking information. You can also log into your account on our website to view order status and tracking details. Our customer service team is available to help with any tracking questions.
